item.title: Better mobile ads for all.
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.excerpt:encoded: A private mobile ad marketplace for Publishers. Advertisers. Readers.

item.title: The Carousel
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.excerpt:encoded: A mobile ad format streamlining actionable browsing on mobile

item.title: We’re rethinking mobile advertising.
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded:
Yieldmo is a unique and powerful marketplace for premium publishers and exceptional advertisers looking to reach their mobile audiences.
We combine the best of design and data, inventing new ad experiences that deliver unprecedented results.

item.title: For Publishers
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: Monetize your mobile traffic through our continuously optimized private marketplace.

item.title: For Advertisers
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: Premium, exclusive inventory to reach quality consumers

item.title: For Readers
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: Mobile ads that won’t piss you off

item.title: Complete Transparency
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We’ve built a completely transparent private marketplace for publishers and advertisers, down to the placement level. No middle man, no black box.

item.title: Increased Revenue
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We do this by helping you monetize spaces on your page or app that weren’t before. Simple, right? And get this, we know it’s typical for a publisher to see an increase in revenue by 90% during the first 12 months!

item.title: Unique and Innovative Mobile Ad Formats
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We’ve built a private marketplace from the ground up rooted in complete transparency—for publishers, advertisers, and readers. Learn More

item.title: Turn-Key Fulfillment
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We fill nearly 100% of placements with exceptional advertisers. We handle the contracts, creative, ad serving, retargeting, and reporting so you don’t have to.

item.title: The Ad Format Lab
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We’re human-centered inventors with a mission. We strive everyday to create great mobile ad experiences and bring them to market. Because we believe mobile ads should be the best versions of themselves—we invent, A/B test relentlessly, and optimize. It’s the perfect union of data + design.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The world’s first, inventing new and unique mobile ad formats

item.title: Our team believes mobile ads should look good… really good.
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We’re a data-driven, design conscious, and curious bunch. That curiosity drives us to work to create amazing things together. Rethinking mobile advertising takes a village and we’re making it happen.

item.title: We love meeting new people.
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded:
Not into forms? 
You can reach us in other ways.

item.title: Our Premium Private Marketplace
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We have built a transparent end-to-end mobile advertising solution so you're in control of where your campaigns will run.

item.title: New and Exclusive Inventory
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We have direct relationships with premium publishers, providing exclusive access to new inventory down to the placement level in web and app.

item.title: Innovative Ad Formats
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We have code on publisher pages, providing a sandbox for our growing collection of innovative mobile ad formats. We enable interactivity and rich media for great brand engagement.

item.title: Mobile Retargeting
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We invented a proprietary attribution technology that is highly accurate, allowing you to effectively retarget customers, provide sequential messaging, frequency cap, and more.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Innovative Ad Formats
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: No banners or pop-ups. Our Ad Format Lab works every to invent new mobile ad formats that delight and don’t annoy you.

item.title: Exceptional User Experience
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We work hard to make sure your browsing experience isn’t compromised. Our formats are custom-styled, enable user-controlled interactivity and rich media.

item.title: Relevant Messaging
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: We work with advertisers and publishers to make sure you’re getting brand messaging that is relevant to you.

item.title: So posted
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded: Bacon ipsum dolor amet andouille pork chop kevin swine, ham pancetta ball tip drumstick landjaeger capicola boudin hamburger kielbasa pork loin. Pork loin picanha leberkas ham hamburger ball tip pork short loin filet mignon sausage prosciutto. Bacon salami landjaeger, frankfurter strip steak kielbasa pastrami venison bresaola corned beef turkey jowl pork chop spare ribs ribeye. Shank ground round swine pancetta boudin. Corned beef tail capicola, chicken sausage beef ribs cupim pork chop short loin alcatra andouille. Drumstick ham hock cupim corned beef meatball venison tail. Tri-tip cupim picanha, leberkas kevin flank meatball shoulder chuck ham salami meatloaf.

Pork belly pork loin flank shank salami. Capicola chicken pastrami tenderloin.

item.title: Let’s talk legal stuff.
item.dc:creator: papoirier
item.content:encoded:
Overview

Yieldmo strives to improve the mobile advertising experience for consumers, publishers, and advertisers. Your privacy is important to us. Accordingly, we have adopted the following Privacy Policy (the “Policy”). This Policy explains how information is collected and utilized by Yieldmo, Inc. (“Yieldmo”, “we”, “us” or “our”). This Policy applies to the Yieldmo website located at www.Yieldmo.com, (the “Yieldmo Website”) and to Yieldmo’s products and services, including the advertising network and platform operated by Yieldmo (the “Yieldmo Service”). Please read this Policy carefully, and feel free to contact us at privacy@yieldmo.com or at the mailing address set forth below if you have any questions regarding its content. By accessing and using the Yieldmo Website or using the various websites and applications that participate in the Yieldmo Service, you consent to us processing your information in accordance with this Policy. The Yieldmo Website and the Yieldmo Service may link to third-party websites or applications. Yieldmo does not control and is not responsible for such third-parties’ privacy practices. Users should consult the privacy policies of such third-party websites or applications to learn about such third-parties’ privacy practices. For purposes of this Policy, “Personally Identifiable Information” or “PII” means any information used or intended to be used to identify a particular individual, including name, address, telephone number, email address, financial account number, and government-issued identifier. “Non-PII” means information not included in the definition of “PII”, including information such as pages or ads visited, clicks on ads, referring domain, visit duration, device type, browser type, IP address and operating system.

Use of Yieldmo Website

Log Data Our servers may automatically record Non-PII from visitors to the Yieldmo Website (“Log Data”). This Log Data may be used to monitor usage, conduct administration and troubleshooting, and assist in improvements to the Yieldmo Website. We may vary and tailor the content the visitor receives in future visits to the Yieldmo Website based on such visitor’s preferences and activities as determined based upon such Log Data. Registration and Account Data If you register to use the Yieldmo Website as a customer (e.g., as an advertiser, agency or publisher), we ask for and store information you provide such as your email, first name, last name, company name, username, address and phone number (collectively, “Registration Data”). After you register to use the Yieldmo Website, you may set up advertising campaigns and other account parameters. We may collect information about the manner of your use of the Yieldmo Website, including session length, IP address, time of usage, viewed pages and files, your advertising campaign selections, and other information regarding your use of the Yieldmo Website (collectively with Registration Data, the “Account Data”). This information may be used to provide the Yieldmo Service to you, conduct internal analysis, account management and maintenance, perform billing, invoicing and payment functions in connection with your account, send services-related information, alerts and promotional messages to you, and maintain and improve the performance of the Yieldmo Website and Yieldmo Service. We may also use this information to offer personalized features, including varying the content you receive in future visits to the Yieldmo Website based on your preferences and activities. Combination of Log Data, Registration and Account Data Log Data may be combined with a visitor’s Registration Data and Account Data once the visitor has registered or subsequently logged into the Yieldmo Website. The combined data is used to provide, monitor and assist in improvements to the Yieldmo Website, and to customize content and advertising displayed to the user on the Yieldmo Website. Log Data, Account Data, Registration Data, and combined data is not sold or rented to third-parties. In addition, such information is not shared with third-parties except in the case of third-party service providers, legal processes and aggregate information,  as noted below. Cookies and Technology Yieldmo may collect the information noted in this Policy using the following methods: cookies, which are small data files that are stored on a visitor’s computer or device, web beacons or pixels (pieces of code used by websites or third-parties to assign online activities to a computer or browser), application software development kits, otherwise known as SDKs, which are libraries of code embedded directly in partner applications, and/or server-to-server connections with our partners. Visitors can set their browser to reject cookies altogether, to reject Yieldmo’s cookies in particular, or to delete cookies. An End User of the Yieldmo Service may opt-out of interest-based advertising from Yieldmo; please refer to the Section entitled “Opt-Out of Interest-Based Advertising” below. Yieldmo Service Type of Information Collected Yieldmo partners with numerous companies to provide online advertisements to end users of mobile websites, mobile applications (“Apps”) and other online media (“End Users”). As an End User browses the mobile Internet or uses Apps that include references to the Yieldmo Service, the End User’s browser or device may request advertisements from Yieldmo’s system. When Yieldmo receives these requests, and/or when Yieldmo delivers advertisements to such browser or device, we may collect Non-PII about these interactions (as well as any further interaction with the advertisements provided by the Yieldmo Service such as views, clicks, conversions, etc.). This may include, for example: IP address; unique identifiers sent to us from mobile devices, network carriers or data providers; information contained in http headers or other internet transfer protocol signals; de-identified personal information (such as email addresses or usernames that are “hashed” so as to be non-identifiable or non-linkable to an individual); anonymous demographic information such as a user’s gender, age, and income range when not tied or not linkable to personal identifiers; attributes of computer or device usage, such as advertisements clicked, websites and content areas visited; date and time of advertisement request, and advertisement delivery and interaction activities; browser type and version; operating system; language setting; information about or from the presence or use of Apps on a mobile device; and location. Such information is stored on Yieldmo’s servers. We may also use the GPS location of your device if you have opted to provide it to one of Yieldmo’s publisher partners. If you have questions about how to disable your device’s location services, we recommend you contact your mobile service carrier or the manufacture of your particular device. On occasion, we may also receive information from third-parties that enables advertisement optimization, independently of or in combination with the information collected by Yieldmo, such as audience interest segments and product categories. From time to time, advertisements served by Yieldmo may contain functionality that enables an End User to enter PII into such advertisements, in order to allow the End User to sign-up for or receive information regarding a product or service offered by an advertiser. In the event that an End User elects to provide PII under such circumstances, we may collect such PII on behalf of such advertiser or its agency. We may use and share such information as described under “How Information is Used” below. How Information is Used The information collected pursuant to this Policy may be used to provide purchasing opportunities and aggregate reports to advertisers, agencies and publishers who participate in the Yieldmo Service, to schedule, deliver and optimize advertisements, to limit the number of times a specific advertisement is presented to the same browser or device (frequency capping), to provide advertisements only to certain types of mobile devices, to anonymously track sales and conversions, to detect and eliminate fraudulent activity, to administer and enhance the Yieldmo Service, and to help Yieldmo display, optimize, target and/or customize advertisements to the interests or preferences of End Users. The PII received pursuant to this Policy may be shared solely with the applicable advertiser or its agency on behalf of whom such information was collected. The End User should review the advertiser’s privacy policy to understand how the advertiser will process such PII. Yieldmo may use such information as described in the preceding paragraph, but only after it has been anonymized so as to be non-identifiable to a particular individual. Yieldmo does not sell or rent information it collects about End Users. Yieldmo may use certain non-sensitive, general health-related information in delivering advertisements based on perceived interest in these topics. This may include information related to general health, wellness, common ailments and illnesses, beauty and fitness, but will not include precise health information (such as a user having a certain medical condition like cancer or diabetes). For example, a user who views content related to parenting might later be shown an ad for children’s clothing or accessories. Similarly, a user who views content related to fitness might later be shown ads related to exercise-related apps. Opt-Out of Interest-Based Advertising End Users can opt out of interest-based advertising served by Yieldmo. Click here to opt-out.In order to comply with an opt-out request, Yieldmo may set a non-unique cookie for the sole purpose of ensuring that such End User is no longer tracked individually. If an End User deletes its cookies or changes computers or devices after opting out, he or she will need to opt out again by clicking the link in this paragraph. End Users also have the option, at any time, to set their browser to not accept cookies from Yieldmo. Following an opt-out, Yieldmo’s system will still provide advertisements to the End User. Please note, however, that these advertisements may be less relevant to such End User’s interests. Data Retention PII and Non-PII are generally retained for up to 13 months, unless Yieldmo is required to retain such information for a longer period of time in order to comply with its legal or contractual obligations. After this timeframe, the information is anonymized in a way that makes it unable to be associated back to an individual computer or device and is then stored for analytical and reporting purposes. Legal and Regulatory Compliance We may disclose information to fulfill legal or regulatory requirements or if we believe, in good faith, that such disclosure is legally required or necessary to protect others’ rights or to prevent harm. Third-Party Service Providers We retain certain third-party service providers to perform functions and services for us. We may share information with these third-party service providers, but only to the extent necessary to perform these functions and services, and only pursuant to obligations that are consistent with this Policy. Business Transfers We may disclose information to third-parties if: (a) we sell or buy any business or assets, in which case we may disclose your information to the prospective seller or buyer of such business or assets, or (b) if Yieldmo or substantially all of its assets are acquired by a third-party, in which case information held by Yieldmo will be one of the transferred assets. Aggregate Information Yieldmo may share aggregate and anonymous usage statistics regarding the Yieldmo Service with the public or businesses with whom we work. Such aggregated information is not PII. Yieldmo may also use such aggregated information to help Yieldmo improve the design and delivery of the Yieldmo Service and increase its effectiveness. Security Yieldmo uses reasonable administrative, technical, personnel and physical measures to safeguard PII and Non-PII in its possession against loss, theft and unauthorized use, disclosure or modification. To that end, we have designed and deployed hardware, software, and networking solutions in an effort to reasonably secure and protect access to our systems and data. Please note that where we have given you (or where you have chosen) a password that enables you to access the Yieldmo Website or Yieldmo Service, you are responsible for keeping this password confidential. Regardless of the precautions taken by you or by us, “perfect security” does not exist on the Internet. We cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to us, and you transmit such information at your own risk. Information Processing and Do-Not-Track Your information may be kept on computers located outside of your state or country, where the privacy laws may not be as protective as those where you live. If you’re located outside the United States and choose to provide your PII to us, we may transfer your PII to the United States and process it there. Yieldmo does not currently take action in response to do-not-track signals received from Internet browsers. However, you may opt-out of having your information be used for advertisement targeting as described under “Opt-Out of Interest-Based Advertising” above. Minimum Age The Yieldmo Service and the Yieldmo Website are not developed for, or directed at, children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly accept registrations or information from users that are under 13. We will delete accounts of any users that we find to be under-age. If you are aware that any child under the age of 13 has become a registered user or provided personally identifiable information to Yieldmo, please inform us at privacy@yieldmo.com, so that we can confirm and take the appropriate steps to remove the account and any related information. Changing Your Newsletter Subscription and Privacy Preferences Yieldmo may send to registered users, advertisers and publishers service and/or account activity-related announcements from time to time. You can unsubscribe from our email newsletters at any time. To do so, you can follow the instructions on the bottom of each newsletter. Publisher and advertiser customers of Yieldmo may also edit their privacy preferences in their member profile or email support@Yieldmo.com for such purpose. You may also write to Yieldmo Member Services at: Yieldmo, Inc. Attn.: Privacy 218 West 18th St., 2nd Floor New York, NY 10011 Changes to Privacy Policy It may be necessary from time to time for us to modify this Policy to reflect changes in the way we collect and use information or changes in privacy-related laws, regulations, and industry standards. Accordingly, we reserve the right to change this policy at any time by posting the revised policy on the Yieldmo Website. Data will be handled in accordance with the policy in effect at the time the data is used. Contact Please contact us with any questions or concerns at privacy@yieldmo.com or via mail at the address below: Yieldmo, Inc. Attn.: Privacy 218 West 18th St., 2nd Floor New York, NY 10011

When a problem comes along You must whip it Before the cream sets out too long You must whip it When something's goin' wrong You must whip it
